about.description:
Easily check your clusters for use of deprecated APIs

Kubernetes 1.16 is slowly starting to roll out, not only across various managed Kubernetes offerings, and with that come a lot of API deprecations.

Kube No Trouble (kubent) is a simple tool to check whether you're using any of these API versions in your cluster and therefore should upgrade your workloads first, before upgrading your Kubernetes cluster.
about.summary: Easily check your clusters for use of deprecated APIs

name: kube-no-trouble

about.description:
Easily check your clusters for use of deprecated APIs

Kubernetes 1.16 is slowly starting to roll out, not only across various managed Kubernetes offerings, and with that come a lot of API deprecations.

Kube No Trouble (kubent) is a simple tool to check whether you're using any of these API versions in your cluster and therefore should upgrade your workloads first, before upgrading your Kubernetes cluster.
about.summary: Easily check your clusters for use of deprecated APIs

raw_meta_yaml:
{% set name = "kube-no-trouble" %}
{% set version = "0.7.3" %}

package:
  name: {{ name|lower }}
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  url: https://github.com/doitintl/kube-no-trouble/archive/{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 4921ce9101f42a34280dd20eeae46d4f759700b8b4db8a32aace4468212d789d

build:
  number: 0

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ compiler('go-nocgo') }}
    - go-licenses

test:
  commands:
    - kubent --version

about:
  home: https://github.com/doitintl/kube-no-trouble
  summary: 'Easily check your clusters for use of deprecated APIs'
  description: |
    Easily check your clusters for use of deprecated APIs

    Kubernetes 1.16 is slowly starting to roll out, not only across various managed Kubernetes offerings, and with that come a lot of API deprecations.

    Kube No Trouble (kubent) is a simple tool to check whether you're using any of these API versions in your cluster and therefore should upgrade your workloads first, before upgrading your Kubernetes cluster.
  license: MIT
  license_family: MIT
  license_file:
    - LICENSE
    - license-files/
  doc_url: https://github.com/doitintl/kube-no-trouble
  dev_url: https://github.com/doitintl/kube-no-trouble

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - rneacsu

about.description:

about.summary: Easily check your clusters for use of deprecated APIs
